description: ff. 222. 208 x 147; 157 x 105 mm. 21 lin. Jumādá I, 1221. Commentary on the qaṣīdah (lāmīyah) of Ṭāhir ibn ʻArab (shāh) al-Iṣfahānī (d. 786/1384: Brockelmann, GAL, S II, 274, 3a), completed in Rajab 1009; for the text commented upon cf. Ẓāhirīyah, ʻulūm al-Qurʼān, p. 111 (Kitāb al-Ṭāhirah). Incip.: ... الحمد لله الذى شرفنا بتعلىم التنزىل ... وبعد فىقول ... ان هذه حواش طاهرىة على القصىدة ... فى ضبط القراءات العشر
author: Tibrīzī, ʻAbd Allāh, 16th/17th cent
creator: Tibrīzī, ʻAbd Allāh, 16th/17th cent
subject: Qurʼan—Readings—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
